TopicTitle: Have F1 / F2 key bindings changed?

Articles.Content:
I can't take screenshots or hide the UI using F1/F2...every other function key works as always.  Was curious if this was a change / bug / or something else entirely?

Thanks
No change in functionality. What platform are you playing on?

-(Accidental) modification of the key mapping, probably the most likely option. I'd check that out first.
-Running some other software in the background that captures those keys. (unlikely, but possible)
-???

PC Win 10 pro

Steam 64bit

I went into the settings.cfg file and the F1 and F2 keys are shown as correct there.  Where else could I look for changes?

Running any kind of video capture software?

the F1 and F2 keys aren't 'shared' in some way, like FN keys or something?

I use Win10 also. Try using fn+f1 or fn+f2. It works for me.

Sreiously, though. When I first upgraded to that computer none of the f keys worked forcing me into a completely hardcore (no quickloads) career. Fortunately, a friend helped me.
